title: Monster Musume no Iru Nichijou OVA
alternative_title: Everyday Life with Monster Girls OVA, モンスター娘のいる日常 OVA
description: Bundled with the 11th and 12th volumes of the manga. The OAD adapted the manga's chapter 17 from the fourth volume, where Miia, Cerea, Mero, and Kurusu go to the gym's pool
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Ecchi>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Harem>, <Genre -> Seinen>]
